row.process:
:SET &variableName# = "PCK.AUTOMIC_TOMCAT.PRV.VARA.TEMP.PP_LIST_JNDI_RESOURCES_RESULT.&$ACTIVATOR_RUNID#.&$PHYS_DATE_YYYYMMDD#" :SET &variablePath# = ""
:IF &UC4RB_TC_RES_TYPE# <> "" : SET &LIST_DS_STATEMENT# = "OK - Listed global resources of type " :ELSE : SET &LIST_DS_STATEMENT# = "OK - Listed global resources of all types" :ENDIF
:SET &hnd# = PREP_PROCESS_REPORT(,,,"*") :PROCESS &hnd#
: SET &line# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&hnd#,1) : SET &line# = STR_TRIM(&line#)
: SET &is_ok# = STR_FIND(&line#, &LIST_DS_STATEMENT#)
: IF &is_ok# <> 0 :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CREATE_PASS_VALUES_VARIABLE : IF &ret# <> 0 : MODIFY_STATE RETCODE = &ret# : PRINT "Unable to create new variable object: UC4_RB_OUT_APPLICATIONS_&$ACTIVATOR_RUNID#" : TERM_PROCESS &hnd# : ELSE : DEFINE &list_ds#, string, 100 : FILL &list_ds#[] = STR_SPLIT(&line#,"-----") : SET &ds_count# = 2 : DEFINE &ds_info#, string, 2 : WHILE &list_ds#[&ds_count#] > "" : FILL &ds_info#[] = STR_SPLIT(&list_ds#[&ds_count#],":") : SET &ds_name# = &ds_info#[1] : IF STR_FIND(&ds_name#,"FAIL - ") = 1 : MODIFY_STATE RETCODE = 2 : SET &remove# = REMOVE_OBJECT("&variableName#") : PRINT &ds_name# : TERM_PROCESS &hnd# : ELSE : SET &ds_type# = &ds_info#[2] : PRINT "&ds_name#: &ds_type#" : PUT_VAR &variableName#, "&ds_name#", "&ds_type#" : ENDIF
: SET &ds_count# = &ds_count# + 1
: ENDWHILE
: ENDIF : ENDIF
:ENDPROCESS
:PSET &UC4RB_OUT_TC_LIST_RESRC# = "&variableName#"
